What's New in DockFlow 1.63

New Feature: Last Context

  • Per-Preset Handoff Notes – Save a short status note for each preset so you can pick up exactly where you left off when you return.
  • Switch Prompt – Optionally get a lightweight popup when leaving a preset to capture a quick update about what you were working on.
  • Arrival Preview – Optionally show the last saved status when you switch to a preset, helping you resume instantly.
  • Auto-Close – Set the popup to close automatically after a short delay for a frictionless experience.
  • Auto-Focus – Automatically place the cursor in the status field when the popup opens for quick note-taking.
  • Preset Contexts View – Review your saved notes for all presets in one place and jump to edit any of them.

Why It Matters

  • Faster Context Recovery – Reduce the "what was I doing?" moment when switching between workflows.
  • Lightweight by Design – Short notes keep momentum without turning into a document.
  • Flexible Control – Turn on only the parts that fit your workflow.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback!
